fields.headline: Tickets to ride
fields.bodyText: Six top destinations New York: £199 British Airways from Heathrow. Valid for departures until December 2. Thomas Cook Flights Direct (0870 7520066, thomascook.com). Sydney: £616 Japan Airlines from Heathrow via Tokyo. Valid for departures until December 7. No minimum stay, maximum one year. Trailfinders (020-7938 3939, trailfinders.co.uk). Hong Kong: £399 Emirates from Gatwick via Dubai. Valid for departures until December 9. Minimum stay seven nights, maximum two months. Bridge the World (0870 4441716, bridgetheworld.com). Los Angeles: £270 American Airlines from Heathrow. Must be booked by December 5. Valid for departures December 25 - March 31. Full payment required when booking. Minimum stay one Saturday night, maximum one month. Airline Network (0800 727747, netflights.com). Amsterdam: £89 British Airways from Manchester. Must be booked online (£10 supplement by phone 0845 773 3377). Valid for departures indefinitely. British Airways (ba.com). Paris: £63 bmi British Midland from Heathrow. Must be booked online (£5 if booked by phone 0870 6070555). Valid for departures indefinitely. No minimum stay, maximum one year. bmi British Midland (flybmi.com). The pick of the rest Palma: £69 Britannia charter from Manchester. Departs December 9 for seven nights. Britannia Direct (0800 000747, BritanniaDirect.com). Funchal: £119 JMC charter from Manchester. Departs November 25 for seven nights. Avro (0870 0360116, avro.co.uk). Faro: £75 Monarch Airlines from Luton. Must be booked by Monday. Valid for departures until March 31 (but not December 20-31). Monarch Scheduled (08700 405040). Brussels: £99.60 bmi British Midland from Leeds-Bradford. Must be booked online (£5 if booked by phone 0870 6070555). Valid for departures indefinitely. No minimum stay, maximum one year. bmi British Midland (flybmi.com). And the rail alternative Paris/Brussels: £59. Lille £49 Eurostar from Waterloo (£49/£39 from Ashford). Must be bought at least 14 days before departure and booked by December 15. For departures until February 9. Minimum one Saturday night or two other nights. Also available for day trips, Saturday/Sunday only but any day December 16-January 3. Eurostar (08705 186186, eurostar.com). NB Fares can change rapidly. These were available in reasonable quantities at the time of writing, but they can sell out in a sudden rush.
